card.text: Welcome to the demo version of Dungeon Adventure, say begin to start a new game. You may say Help at any time when in doubt

voice.intro: Welcome to the demo version of Dungeon Adventure, say begin to start a new game. You may say Help at any time when in doubt.

card.text: Welcome, adventurer. In the world of Dungeon Adventure, there are countless of creatures for you to battle and  tons of loots to collect. Here's an Iron Sword to aid you in your journey. My dear adventurer, please take care. Your journey begins in the Town of Dawn.
card.prompt: You can choose to go either of the four directions such as: go north

card.title: G0
card.text: You arrive at the market to the north of the town. You hear villagers crying from afar and you decide to take a look. Much to your surprise, you find a human-sized goblin beating people up. These kind of creatures are extremely rare nowadays. You decide to take it down before it causes more damage.

voice.intro: Congratulations, you've found a secret room. You look around and see a single door with a star on it.

card.title: G1
card.text: Upon making some eye contacts, the goblin seems to have set you as its next target. From afar, it charges towards you with a big stick.

voice.intro: Upon making some eye contacts, the goblin seems to have set you as its next target. From afar, it charges towards you with a big stick.

card.title: YOU LOSE
card.text: You attempt to sneak behind the goblin. However, in a frenzy state it swings the stick around his body, and it unfortunately lands on your neck. My dear adventurer, may you continue your journey after healing your broken neck.
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "Start again." Otherwise you can say "Exit skill."

voice.intro: The goblin swings his stick at you. You try to parry with your iron sword, but your strength is no match to a frenzy goblin’s. The stick lands right on your head. My dear adventurer, may you continue your journey after getting out of the coma.
voice.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "Start again." Otherwise you can say "Exit skill."

card.title: G12
card.text: You successfully dodges the goblin’s attack. Now you are only 2 steps away from the goblin. However, it seems that it has gotten angry with you. The next strike is coming in seconds.

voice.intro: You successfully dodges the goblin’s attack. Now you are only 2 steps away from the goblin. However, it seems that it has gotten angry with you. The next strike is coming in seconds.

card.title: YOU LOSE
card.text: The goblin swings his stick one more time. You try to dodge but the attack arrives much earlier that you thought. The stick lands right on your back. My dear adventurer, may you continue your journey after healing your broken spine.
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "Start again." Otherwise you can say "Exit skill."

voice.intro: The goblin swings his stick one more time. You try to dodge but the attack arrives much earlier that you thought. The stick lands right on your back. My dear adventurer, may you continue your journey after healing your broken spine.

card.title: G122
card.text: You awkwardly swing your sword. Although your strength is no match to a goblin’s, it runs right into the blade. That completely disables the evil creature. Good job! You just saved the town. The village head appreciates your heroic deed. As a reward, he offers you a secret trial of intelligence.

voice.intro: You enter a room. What would you like to do?

card.title: Puzzle
card.text: The scholar of great wisdom says to you: congratulations on killing your first enemy. However, A great hero should not only be courageous, but also intelligent. Your test is simple, in order to prove your wisdom, you need to answer the following riddle. Say ready when you are ready, or say skip if you wish not to take the challenge..

voice.intro: The scholar of great wisdom says to you: congratulations on killing your first enemy. However, A great hero should not only be courageous, but also intelligent. Your test is simple, in order to prove your wisdom, you need to answer the following riddle. Say ready when you are ready, or say skip if you wish not to take the challenge.

card.title: READY CASE
card.text:
I'm always smiling, but I never laugh.
I once loved life, from cat to calf.
I'm always staring, but I cannot see.
I once held secrets, those give to me.
What am I? The choices are: candle, wine, skull, mask

voice.intro:
I'm always smiling, but I never laugh.

I'm always staring, but I cannot see.
I once held secrets, those give to me.
What am I? The choices are: candle, wine, skull, mask

card.title: SKIP CASE
card.text: The best warrior always combines his wisdom and fighting skills to defeat his enemies. Best of luck in future adventures! The game demo ends here.
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "Start again." Otherwise you can say "Exit skill."

card.title: Correct answer
card.text: You are indeed a very brilliant adventurer. As you proves your wisdom by solving all the riddles, the grand mage offers to teach you about the power of magic, Fire magic or holy magic. Which one would you like to learn?

voice.intro: You are indeed a very brilliant adventurer. As you proves your wisdom by solving all the riddles, the grand mage offers to teach you about the power of magic. What kind of magic would you like to learn?
